name: Undead Napalm
description: You are alone in a destroyed world. Zombies run loose on the streets. It is up to you to clean up all of the zombies. It may seem like an impossible task for one person, but you have been given a tool to survive. That tool is the All Terrain Armoured Flame Launching Super Tank®, manufactured by Undead Napalm Industries. You have been chosen to save the world, but can you do it? Play Undead Napalm to find out. Will be realeased spring 2017.
